Hero.tagline: We redefine the standard of vision correction with uncompromising precision and safety.

Philosophy.description:
It's not simply about correcting vision.
From the moment you open your eyes in the morning to when you fall asleep,
we make every world you encounter clearer and more beautiful.
This is the promise of Healing Eye Clinic.

precision.title: Precision
precision.description:
Through our ultra-precision system challenging 0% surgical error,
we craft perfect vision for your eyes.

safety.title: Safety
safety.description:
With medical professionals from university hospital faculty and
state-of-the-art equipment at university hospital standards,
you can trust us with complete confidence.

empathy.title: Empathy
empathy.description:
Refined through tens of thousands of cases,
our surgical expertise and warm healing environment
truly understand your eyes.

visionCorrection.title: Vision Correction
visionCorrection.description:
From SMILE LASIK to Custom LASEK and Lens Implantation.
Ultra-precision laser solutions that go beyond the limits of traditional vision correction.

eyeDisease.title: Eye Disease
eyeDisease.subtitle: Eye Disease Center
eyeDisease.description: Dry Eye Syndrome, Glaucoma, Retinal Diseases

faculty.title: University Faculty
faculty.subtitle: Medical Staff from University Hospital Faculty
faculty.description:
Medical professionals with extensive clinical experience and expertise
provide dedicated 1:1 care from consultation through surgery to post-operative management.

equipment.title: High-End Equipment
equipment.subtitle: State-of-the-Art Equipment at University Hospital Standards
equipment.description:
Equipped with the latest technology including Ziemer Z8 and ZEISS SUITE,
first to use German Rein Lens, and ranked #1 nationwide in PanOptix quadrifocal usage,
proving our expertise in cataract surgery.

guarantee.title: Lifetime Guarantee
guarantee.subtitle: Lifetime Vision Guarantee System
guarantee.description:
Taking responsibility for the next 40 years of your second life,
our lifetime guarantee system ensures your vision for life.

Review.title: Real Stories
Review.subtitle: Data-proven results, real stories from our patients.

reviews.name: Kim Ji*
reviews.content: I never knew mornings without glasses could be this amazing. The day of surgery was slightly hazy, but it was a whole new world from the next day. I was especially worried about night halos, but I have no discomfort and drive at night without any issues.

reviews.name: Lee Hyung*
reviews.content: I couldn't even read my phone without reading glasses, but now I can see golf balls clearly and text my friends comfortably. It feels like I've received the gift of quality of life, beyond just surgery. The clinic facility is as luxurious as a hotel, and the staff were so kind that I felt comfortable throughout the surgery.

reviews.name: Park Seo*
reviews.content: I was devastated when I was told LASIK was impossible due to thin corneas, but Healing Eye Clinic restored my vision with ICL. There's no lens discomfort at all, and dry eyes are actually better than when I wore contact lenses. I regret wasting time hesitating. Highly recommended!

reviews.name: Choi Min*
reviews.content: Work was so difficult due to presbyopia, but after monovision LASIK, near-distance tasks have become much easier. I was told there would be an adaptation period, but I adapted faster than expected, and now I can read meeting materials without glasses.

reviews.name: Jung Ha*
reviews.content: I was very worried about the pain, but I only had eye irritation for about 2 days, and it was comfortable after that. After removing the bandage contact lens, I could feel my vision improving dramatically. I'm maintaining 20/16 vision. Thank you!

reviews.name: Ahn Soo*
reviews.content: I had re-operation due to vision deterioration after LASIK at another clinic. I was anxious, but the director thoroughly checked my corneal condition and proceeded safely. Thank you. Now I'm maintaining 20/16 vision, and my night vision has improved compared to before.

reviews.name: Yoon Ji*
reviews.content: I was worried because of thin corneas, but Healing Eye Clinic safely performed LASEK. Recovery was fast, and now it's been 6 months and I'm completely satisfied with my vision!

reviews.name: Cho Hyun*
reviews.content: After cataract surgery, I feel like I've returned to my vision from 30 years ago. I play golf without glasses, read books, and my life has changed. Don't hesitate and get a consultation!

PremiumFacility.headline: Relaxation
PremiumFacility.description:
A space where even the pre-surgery tension turns into excitement.
Healing Eye Clinic's premium lounge embodies the elegance of a 5-star hotel.
Welcome your new vision in the best condition.

doctors.philosophy: Perfectionism that allows not even 1% margin of error. Based on extensive clinical experience as a university hospital professor and deep understanding of cutting-edge equipment, we help you find the clearest moments of your life.

AIPrediction.title: Find the Perfect Surgery
AIPrediction.description:
Healing Eye Clinic AI, trained on over 100,000 clinical cases,
analyzes your corneal data and lifestyle
to recommend the safest and most effective vision correction procedure.
features: 3D Analysis of Corneal Thickness and Shape

BrandStory.headline: More Than Vision,
BrandStory.description:
Beyond simply correcting vision,
to make your life clearer and more beautiful.
Healing Eye Clinic sculpts the most perfect vision
at the intersection of technology and art.

DirectorMessage.headline: Healing Your Eyes,
DirectorMessage.greeting: Hello, I am Dr. Kim Sun-young, Representative Director of Healing Eye Clinic.
paragraphs: 'Seeing' is not merely recognizing objects, but a process of facing the faces of loved ones, remembering beautiful scenery, and fully experiencing every moment of life.

From my time as a university hospital professor until now, having met tens of thousands of patients, what I have realized is that ultimately, the best medical care begins with 'empathy.' Listening carefully to even the smallest discomforts of patients and treating them with the care I would give to family—that is the essence of 'healing' as I understand it.

More than the title of Gangnam's only solo-practicing female representative director, I want to be remembered as a lifelong primary physician who takes responsibility for each person's eye health to the very end. For your most brilliant moments, Healing Eye Clinic will be with you.

timeline.title: Healing Eye Clinic Opening
timeline.description: Premium Vision Correction Center opened in Yeoksam-dong 808 Tower

timeline.title: University Hospital-Grade Equipment Introduction
timeline.description: Established state-of-the-art vision correction equipment and precision examination system

timeline.description: Full-scale launch of minimal-incision SMILE LASIK

timeline.description: Launched specialized treatment with premium multifocal IOL

timeline.title: Minimal-Incision CLEAR LASIK
timeline.description: Introduced CLEAR LASIK with differentiated treatment system

timeline.title: Achieved 50,000 Cumulative Surgeries
timeline.description: Achieved 4.9/5.0 patient satisfaction, established as regional leading ophthalmology clinic

timeline.title: AI Precision Examination System
timeline.description: Established cutting-edge AI-based personalized vision correction system

address.title: Address
address.line2: (1 minute walk from Sinnonhyeon Station Exit 6)

Philosophy.headline: The Standard
Philosophy.description:
Based on three core values,
Healing Eye Clinic promises the most perfect vision correction.

values.title: Safety First
values.subtitle: Uncompromising Safety Standards
values.description: With 60-step precision pre-operative examination and triple cross-verification system, we do not allow even 0.01% margin of error.

values.title: Personalized
values.subtitle: Customized Plan for One Individual Only
values.description: We reject factory-style surgery. We design 1:1 customized plans considering the patient's corneal fingerprint, lifestyle patterns, and occupational environment.

values.title: Lifetime Care
values.subtitle: Lifelong Eye Health Partner
values.description: We operate a lifetime management system that can accurately track and observe your eye condition even after 10 or 20 years post-surgery.

Footer.tagline: Experience the new standard of vision correction. Premium service, state-of-the-art technology, and a brand new life for your eyes.
